original_title: 淫乱カップル 北へ･･･ 蒼吹雪
overview: Porsuing human desires to Hokkaido in the middle of winter... Aofuki-chan, Kikurin and Katsuyuki Hirano in extreme snowstorm, open-air bath and cold. "Hot stuff that melts the ice." The purpose is to shoot sex everywhere, but eventually the actor Kikurin and the actress fall in love.
title: Nasty Couple To the North...
